name: Test de Habilidades Comerciales
description:
This is a graphic adventure with point & click mechanics. It develops in a futuristic setting and you have to solve some problems in order to release a new intergalactic spaceship, designed and produced by the company you work on.

The aim of the game is to implement an abilities test, designed to measure this feature in people. Currently this is only a prototype. 

This game was developed for The Wise Seeker S.L. 

https://www.thewiseseeker.com/
